  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit">CompileUnit</a></>}>
Stores all information relating to a compile unit, be it in its original instance in the object file to its brand new cloned and generated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> tree. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/compileunit/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a></>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> is a named program scope that is used for ODR uniquing of types. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontexttree">DeclContextTree</a></>}>
This class gives a tree-like API to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a> that stores the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> objects. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontexttree/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declmapinfo">DeclMapInfo</a></>}>
Info type for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a> storing the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declcontext">DeclContext</a> pointers. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/declmapinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/dwarfemitter">DwarfEmitter</a> presents interface to generate all debug info tables. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/classic/dwarfemitter/#details">More...</a>
